text: @AnnCoulter A sincere question. Once you get COVID19 and then recover, can you become infected again??  If develop immunity, ok for lots of cases for young and healthy. Young and healthy rarely have serious problems with COVID19. Good to get it, stay home 2 weeks and then be immune forever

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
